title: kavalai ellaam
sahitya:
kavalai ellAm kaLaindiDuvadun paramE kamalAsini vANi paNiyum shivamE

anupallavi

abalai enrarindum annaiyE nIyE AdaravaLikkAdiruppadum muraiyO

caraNam

avaniyilE dinam alaind tirindE tavap-payanAl nin kazhaliNai ninaindEn
evariDamum nAn irandu nillAmalE uvakaiyuDan un dayavaruLvAyE
